text: If a merchant bank fails to maintain the standards and requirements of this chapter, the Commissioner shall, by order, revoke or limit the exercise of the powers of the merchant bank's authority.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Application and Certification as a Merchant Bank.

heading.catch_text: Revocation or subsequent limitation of certificate of authority.
